title: (x) Artforum serif text font - Sabon {Jan E}
content:
Hi everyone,

Any ideas on what this text face is?

j

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201085438im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/artforum_4498.png)

 [‹ Sony Vaio Logo Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201085438/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48888 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Contempo" lettering in iron gate - (similar to) Neutraface {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201085438/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48887 "Go to next forum topic")
author: JLM

comments.content: It’s a Garamond, I’d say Simoncini.
